lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Farmers and others in agribusiness can now achieve the benefits of price stability by trading in option markets," the paper, written by Clemson University professor Kandice Kahl, said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Interest in promoting understanding of options trading among farmers also has been stirred in Congress by a proposed change in agricultural policy that would have the effect of exposing participants in federal farm programs to fluctuations in income subsidies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The proposal -- supported by the Reagan administration and a cross-section of lawmakers -- would allow farmers to receive at least 92 pct of their income subsidies regardless of how much they planted.
